Package grails.plugin.multitenant.core.datasource

Interface Summary
DataSourceUrlResolver This resolver takes in a tenantId and returns the datasource url for that tenant.
TenantDataSource Created by Felipe Cypriano Date: 08/04/2009 Time: 08:30:29

Base interface to TentantDataSource.
 

Class Summary
TenantDataSourceImpl DataSource extension that allows for a custom url per tenant.
TenantDataSourcePostProcessor Postprocessor that uses a tenant-aware implementation of datasource, that allows for datasource url switching.
TenantJndiDataSource This class allows you to have a switching jndi datasource per tenant with the multi-tenant plugin
TenantPooledDataSource This class allows pooled data sources to be used for multiple tenant databases.
TenantTransactionAwareDataSourceProxy This class will intercept any calls by the grails infrastructure for a data source and return the proper data source for the current tenant.
